text:
Hi! I have a standard use case question. In my email CTA I want to redirect the user to an iOS app (if installed) or redirect to a webpage. I can see possibly two solutions:
• CTA with a module to capture the click and use javascript to run the redirect or
• CTA redirects to a webpage which has redirect rules or javascript to then redirect to the iOS app
Do you feel these are valid solutions? Especially with the first one, I am concerned about CTA metrics being captured.
The second one is the only available option, you can't use JS in emails
<@U25PYL3Q8> can you help us with this one?
